issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Window events such as singleTap,doubleTap,swipe not working for Android browser.

Steps to reproduce:
# Package KS for mobile web and deploy it. Open the url in Mobile web browser.
# Navigate to BaseUI>WindowEvents
# Try to trigger each event 

Actual Result:
# singleTap, doubleTap, swipe, click, dblClick events are not being fired.

Expected Result:
# Each event trigger should show the right event fired message on the screen and also on the console.

Working for Safari Browser on iOS Devices
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Android - All expected Window Events are not working
fields.environment:
Appc Studio: 3.2.3.201404031900
Sdk:3.2.3.v20140403105720
alloy:1.3.1
titanium:3.2.3-alpha2
titanium-code-processor:1.1.1-alpha
Osx: Maverick(10.9.2)
Browser: Safari, Chrome
Device:iPhone 5C(7.1),Nexus7(v4.3)

comments.body: Closing ticket as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
